alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 11 at 3:05AM PST until November 11 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Disautel Pass, Odessa, Okanogan, Omak, Grand Coulee, Mansfield, Coulee City, Tonasket, Badger Mountain Road, Ritzville, Bridgeport, Waterville, Creston, Oroville, Wilbur, Nespelem, Brewster, and Harrington. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau
